name: Dreams and Darkness
description:
Currently in development!

An action-packed bullet hell/tower defense game inspired by games such as Enter the Gungeon and Elemental Tower Defense!

In a world being slowly consumed by a mysterious force, you are the last line of defense to ward off evil!

Features

  • Towers!
  • (Currently) 3 powerful spells!
  • Various enemies with different weaknesses and strengths!
  • Boss fights!
  • An element type system that makes your choice of defense meaningful!
  • The power to dig new paths for enemies to travel through!

...And more to come!

This game is currently still in development and in its very early stages. This means that many things are barely polished, aren't finished and has many placeholders, but it is currently in a state that makes it playable.

This version of the game is a demo and will always be free, whereas the full release will have an included campaign, more unique things to play with and a price tag. 

The demo will have a bit of every system we are making, and have one play mode being Endless Mode.  Set up your strategy, find bugs, break our game to pieces if you want, and give us feedback!

You can follow us on Twitter here: @MildBreezeSTU

or join our Discord: https://discord.gg/q58p4vGp83

Controls

Left Click: Select
Right Click: Shoot
Tab: Toggle tower menu/spell bar
T: Open talent tree
I: Open inventory
1/2/3: Spells
Escape: Pause menu
